pluggable.name: RSS 2.0
pluggable.author: Habari Community
pluggable.description: Provides an RSS 2.0 feed for entries and comments.

help.value:
Provides an RSS 2.0 feed for entries and comments.

The RSS feed will be rendered at 

yoursite/rss/1
much like the ATOM feed is rendered at 
yoursite/atom/1
.
